name: takeRight
signature: { (n: number): <A, E, R>(self: Stream<A, E, R>) => Stream<A, E, R>; <A, E, R>(self: Stream<A, E, R>, n: number): Stream<A, E, R>; }
description: Takes the last specified number of elements from this stream.
